sql.check: SELECT NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sqlite_master WHERE name='word_actions' and type='table')
sql.text: CREATE TABLE "word_actions" ( "Id" INTEGER CONSTRAINT "PK_word_actions" PRIMARY KEY, "StartDate" TEXT NOT NULL, "EndDate" TEXT NOT NULL, "MaxSequence" INTEGER NOT NULL, "WordsCount" INTEGER NOT NULL, "NewWordsCount" INTEGER NOT NULL, "CorrectAnswersCount" INTEGER NOT NULL, "WrongAnswersCount" INTEGER NOT NULL, "SelectedCardWordsCount" INTEGER NOT NULL )
